iti80:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti80:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three unskillful thoughts.
iti80:2.3: The thought of being looked up to; of getting material possessions, honor, and popularity; and of fondness for others.
iti80:2.4: These are the three unskillful thoughts.”
iti80:3.1: “One concerned with being looked up to,
iti80:3.4: is far from the ending of fetters.
iti80:4.1: But one who gives up children and herds,
iti80:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
